info.name: get-watchlist-quotes
info.description: Get payload reduced quotes for watchlist

parameters.name: data
parameters.metaDescription: The result to be returned to the flow that called `Invoke Flow`.

parameters.name: data
parameters.metaDescription: The value to apply as the `data` argument of the JavaScript code. For objects and arrays, `data` is passed by reference.

parameters.name: code
parameters.metaDescription: A JavaScript function body. Supports `await` and returning promises. `data` is the value of the Data parameter. `logger` is the API Builder logger. See the docs for more info: https://docs.axway.com/bundle/api-builder/page/docs/developer_guide/flows/flow_nodes/javascript_flow_node/index.html

parameters.name: headers
parameters.metaDescription: The HTTP headers to set. Overriding the default header keys is case-sensitive.

parameters.name: data
parameters.metaDescription: The value to apply as the `data` argument of the JavaScript code. For objects and arrays, `data` is passed by reference.

parameters.metaDescription: A JavaScript function body. Supports `await` and returning promises. `data` is the value of the Data parameter. `logger` is the API Builder logger.
